resources.string:
This application will share our location with other users. 
 We are using the google maps fragment along with location services to place a marker at our current location. 
 
 
 ■ App Features: 
 ● App consists a menu of 4 items, which are-Google Maps, Google Places, Email and About.
 ● If the user clicks on the marker, the current lat/lang and current address will appear on the screen. 
 ● User can swap the main area in the app from a map, to a RecyclerView with a list of the Places found near our current location, to an email activity or fragment, and an about page.
 ● The About page consists of description of the app and list of team members who contributed in this project. 
 ● Nice and beautiful animations to enhance the UI of the App. 
 
 
 ■ Developer Information: 
 
 Team Members: 
 
 ● Rajdeep Singh (1115120) 
 
 ● Raman Singh (1114562) 
 
 ● Sohail Ahmed (1088669) 
 
 Assignment: INFO-6124 Project 2F2022
